attributes.action: Request a UK Vote in Favour or Against Syrian Airstrikes not just MP voting
attributes.additional_details: So this petition is to request that David Cameron requests a vote from his people of the UK to vote For or Against the Syrian Airstrikes and not just his MPs.
attributes.background:
David Cameron has recently asked his members to vote in favour or against Syrian Airstrikes, potentially killing innocent people.

Why David Cameron thinks the vote from his members (MPs) is more important than his people of the UK when he is putting our lives at risk!
